main event: Observer saw a round shaped object emitting intense light and flashes in Syosset, NY, on October 27, 1966.
interesting points: The object had an orange halo and was pulsating and rotating., The observer reported that their house was sparking at the same time as the sighting., The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes., The object turned northward and then disappeared., There were no photographs or physical evidence available.
sighted object: round object with an orange halo
